Message:
Everyone was preparing
the ships to evacuate
the remaining survivors.

But then out of nowhere,
cursed creatures appeared
and attacked us.

I stood up against the creatures
without even a second thought.

I’m nowhere near as powerful
as a real Viking, after all.

And as expected,
I didn’t last too long at all.
They beat me up so hard,
I could barely even stand...

Nevertheless,
I was somehow able to distract
the creatures long enough
for everyone to escape.

In the end,
I wonder if I looked
even just a little cool...
